items: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your arms extended out to the sides at shoulder height.
Jump and cross your right foot in front of your left foot while crossing your arms in front of your chest.
Jump back to the starting position.
Jump and cross your left foot in front of your right foot while crossing your arms in front of your chest.
Jump back to the starting position.
Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
Increases heart rate and improves cardiovascular health
Works multiple muscle groups, including the legs, arms, and core
Improves coordination and balance
Burns calories and aids in weight loss
Can be modified for different fitness levels and abilities
Chest muscles
Shoulder muscles
Abdominal muscles
Leg muscles
Jumping Jacks
Star Jumps
Plank Jacks
Seal Jacks
Scissor Jacks
